name.description: A unique identifier for the asset bundle. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.

version.description: Semantic version of the asset (e.g., '1.0.0'). Update this when making changes to the asset.

title.description: A human-readable name for the asset bundle, shown in the DNAnexus UI.

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the asset bundle does, its purpose, and any important usage notes.

distribution.description: The base operating system for the asset. Only 'Ubuntu' is currently supported.

release.description: The Ubuntu release version for the asset (e.g., '20.04'). Must match the release of the app that uses this asset.

execDepends.description: List of software dependencies required by the asset. Each item can be a package name (string) or an object specifying name, package_manager, and version.

oneOf.description: Name of the package (default manager: apt).

package_manager.description: The package manager to use for installing the dependency.

version.description: Specific version of the package to install (optional).

instanceType.description: DNAnexus instance type (e.g., 'mem1_ssd1_v2_x8') used to build the asset bundle. Choose based on resource requirements.

excludeResource.description: List of files or directories to exclude from the asset bundle. Useful for omitting temporary or unnecessary resources.

runSpecVersion.description: Internal versioning for asset builder logic. Usually leave as default unless instructed otherwise.
